Compulsory - Entity中的类
ClassName: Compulsory
Description: This is the entity class that used to store
the information about single compulsory dish read from file

This constructor is used to do nothing

CompulsoryFile - Control.FileManage中的类
ClassName: CompulsoryFile
Description: This is the control class that used to operate on
the 'compulsory.json' file which contains all the information about compulsory dishes in json format.
CompulsoryFile() - 类 的构造器Control.FileManage.CompulsoryFile
This constructor used to read all the information about compulsory dishes from json file
and store them into Compulsory[] which is the array of Compulsory objects.

the information about the compulsory dishes read from file
